channel.title: Summoning Button!
channel.description: How can I make the dismiss button work in my summoning tab because when i click dismiss it opens a thing saying Yes or no I click yes and the npc still won't dismiss. Same with no. Can someone please tell me where i can fix this? Please comment me a tiny guide thanks.
